description: This script provides a testing tool for real Jira authentication by prompting the user for credentials, validating input, creating a JiraService instance, and attempting to validate credentials and retrieve user projects. It serves as a diagnostic utility within the backend API testing suite.

classes.name: JiraService
classes.description: Service class for interacting with Jira's API, handling authentication, and project retrieval.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Data schema for login credentials required to authenticate with Jira.

methods.name: test_real_jira_credentials()
methods.description: Function to prompt user for Jira credentials, validate input, instantiate JiraService, and test authentication and project access.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function orchestrating the interactive Jira authentication testing process.
